content.question: <math alttext="R b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rb</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> reacts with <math alttext="O" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in a mole ratio of <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, forming the ionic compound <math alttext="R b 2 O" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>Rb</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following elements will react with <math alttext="O" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in a mole ratio of <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, forming an ionic compound, and why?

choices.label: <math alttext="S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because it is in the same group as <math alttext="O" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="C s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Cs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because it is in the same group as <math alttext="R b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rb</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="S r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Sr</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because it is in the same period as <math alttext="R b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rb</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="B r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Br</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because the atomic mass of <math alttext="B r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Br</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is similar to that of <math alttext="R b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rb</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: <math alttext="C s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Cs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, because it is in the same group as <math alttext="R b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Rb</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: 4.C: Explain the connection between particulate-level and macroscopic properties of a substance using models and representations.
